name: Abomination
description: "Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!"

name: Absorbing Man
description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)

name: Adam Warlock
description: After each turn, draw a card if you're winning here.

name: Aero
description: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.

name: Agatha Harkness
description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

name: Agent 13
description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

name: Agent Coulson
description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

name: Alioth
description: On Reveal: Destroy all unrevealed enemy cards here.

name: America Chavez
description: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +2 Power.

name: Angel
description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

name: Angela
description: After you play a card here, +1 Power.

name: Annihilus
description: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that can't.

name: Ant Man
description: Ongoing: If your side of this location is full, +3 Power.

name: Apocalypse
description: When you discard this, put it back with +4 Power.

name: Armor
description: Ongoing: Cards here can't be destroyed.

name: Arnim Zola
description: On Reveal: Destroy one of your other cards here to copy it at the other locations.

name: Attuma
description: After each turn, destroy this if you have another card here.

name: Baron Mordo
description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.

name: Baron Zemo
description: On Reveal: Add the lowest-Cost card from your opponent's deck here on your side.

name: Bast
description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

name: Beast
description: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. They cost 1 less next turn.

name: Beta Ray Bill
description: On Reveal: Shuffle Stormbreaker into your deck.

name: Bishop

name: Black Bolt

name: Black Cat
description: If this is in your hand after the turn, discard it.

name: Black Knight

name: Black Panther
description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

name: Black Swan

name: Black Widow
description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

name: Blade
description: On Reveal: Discard the rightmost card from your hand.

name: Blink

name: Blob

name: Blue Marvel
description: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

name: Caiera

name: Captain America

description: On Reveal: Set ALL cards here to 3 Power.

name: Venom
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. Add their Power to this card.

name: Vibranium
description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed.

name: Viper
description: On Reveal: One of your other cards here switches sides.

name: Vision
description: You can move this each turn.

name: Viv Vision
description: When you move a card to a location, move this card there as well.

name: Vulture
description: When this card moves, +5 Power.

name: War Machine
description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

name: Warpath
description: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +5 Power.

name: Wasp
description: "My secret power is that I get things done."

name: Wave
description: On Reveal: All cards cost a maximum of 4 until the end of next turn.

name: Werewolf By Night
description: After you play a card, move there to gain +2 Power if it has an On Reveal.

name: White Queen
description: On Reveal: Copy the highest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand.

name: White Tiger
description: On Reveal: Add a 8-Power Tiger to another location.

name: White Widow
description: On Reveal: Add a -1-Power Widow's Kiss to your opponent's side of here.

name: Widow's Bite
description: While this is in your hand, you can't draw cards.

name: Widow's Kiss
description: Ongoing: Your other cards here have -1 Power.

name: Winter Soldier
description: "It's time for me to face the past."

name: Witchfire
description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1.

name: Wolfsbane
description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

name: Wolverine
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it with +2 Power at a random location.

name: Wong
description: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

name: X-23
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

name: Yellowjacket
description: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards here with -1 Power.

name: Yo-Yo
description: When this card moves, move it back with +1 Power.

name: Yondu
description: On Reveal: Destroy the top card of your opponent's deck.

name: Zabu
description: Ongoing: Your 4-Cost cards cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

name: Zero
description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
